name: Improved Brutal Strike
effects: you gain additional Brutal Strike options: Staggering Blow and Sundering Blow
limits: Staggering Blow: the target has disadvantage on its next saving throw and cannot make opportunity attacks until the start of your next turn
Sundering Blow: before the start of your next turn, the next attack roll made by another creature against the target gains +5; only one Sundering Blow bonus can apply
notes: At Barbarian level 17, Brutal Strike damage increases to 2d10 and you can use two different Brutal Strike effects per use.
